name: JP (@byjp@hachyderm.io)
summary:
My nesting partner & I have been dealing with a fever, dizziness & grotty noses for the last 5 days (yay, flu season!)

We're doing okay, but I can tell she's reached a breaking point of sorts as I can now hear, echoing down the corridor from the other room, a dejected version of "Santa Claus is coming to Town" with the repeated lyrics: "No quiero mas snot" ðŸ˜…
